org.xbmc.jsonrpc.client

Class MusicClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.jsonrpc.client.Client
      • org.xbmc.jsonrpc.client.MusicClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient, IMusicClient

    public class MusicClient
extends Client
implements IMusicClient
    Takes care of every music related stuff, notably the music database.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

        public boolean removeFromPlaylist(INotifiableManager manager,
                         int position)

      • getCover

        public Bitmap getCover(INotifiableManager manager,
              ICoverArt cover,
              int size)
        Returns a pre-resized album cover. Pre-resizing is done in a way that the bitmap at least as large as the specified size but not larger than the double.
        Specified by:
        getCover in interface IMusicClient
        Parameters:
        manager - Postback manager
        cover - Cover object
        size - Minmal size to pre-resize to.
        Returns:
        Thumbnail bitmap

      • getCompilationArtistIDs

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getCompilationArtistIDs(INotifiableManager manager)
        Returns a list containing all artist IDs that stand for "compilation". Best case scenario would be only one ID for "Various Artists", though there are also just "V.A." or "VA" naming conventions.
        Specified by:
        getCompilationArtistIDs in interface IMusicClient
        Returns:
        List of compilation artist IDs

      • getCurrentlyPlaying

        static IControlClient.ICurrentlyPlaying getCurrentlyPlaying(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        Converts query response from HTTP API to a list of Genre objects. Each row must return the following columns in the following order:
        1. idGenre
        2. strGenre
        Parameters:
        response -
        Returns:
        List of Genres private ArrayList parseGenres(String response) { ArrayList genres = new ArrayList(); String[] fields = response.split(""); try { for (int row = 1; row < fields.length; row += 2) { genres.add(new Genre( Connection.trimInt(fields[row]), Connection.trim(fields[row + 1]) )); } } catch (Exception e) { System.err.println("ERROR: " + e.getMessage()); System.err.println("response = " + response); e.printStackTrace(); } return null; //genres; }
